column1: The family requests that visiting hours be observed at Pellerin Funeral Home in St. Martinville from 8:30 am until 8:00 pm on Sunday
column2: and continue on Monday at 8:00 am until 10:00 am.  Rev. Jessie Charpentier will officiate at the Funeral Service. Interment will follow at St. Elizabeth Cemetery in Coteau Holmes.
